Testimonials

What People Say About Me

"My name is John Hidalgo. I met Dani maybe three years ago, in the time that I have known him, I have found him to be a great and responsible person and he fulfills his obligations as requested. I was fortunate to meet him as a coworker and English teacher, In my opinion he helped me a lot to improve my English level, he has many methods and very agile dynamics to learn; on the other hand in the professional side, I could see the products as a result of his work and I think they are of excellent quality, for this and more reasons I recommend his work to anyone who wants to contact him for his good relevance and management."

- John Hidalgo,
Ex-Coworker at Traze

"Working with Fletch has been an absolute pleasure and a game-changer for our Client. As an amazing technical writer and documentation specialist, Fletch brought an unparalleled level of expertise and dedication to the team. His ability to transform complex technical information into clear, concise, and user-friendly documentation is truly impressive.
From the outset, Fletch demonstrated a keen understanding of our clients needs and goals. He approaches every task with meticulous attention to detail and a forward thinking mindset. His efforts have brought new ideas to light and displayed his ability to truly impact changes for our client.
What sets Fletch apart is his ability to see the "big picture" and offer proactive approaches to reach goals. He seamlessly integrated with our clients team, always open to feedback and ready to make adjustments to meet our evolving requirements. His thorough research, careful planning, and exceptional writing skills significantly improved our documentation quality, leading to enhanced user satisfaction and reduced support requests.
Fletch's professionalism, creativity, and technical acumen make him a standout in his field. His work has had tangible positive impacts on our projects, and I would highly recommend him to anyone in need of top-tier technical writing and documentation services. Working with Fletch has been an amazing experience, and we look forward to continuing our partnership into the future. "

- Jim Burk,
General Manager Midwest at Zilker (Agency that placed me at Superna)

"I have had the good fortune to know Fletcher for more than three years, and I can say that he is an incredibly self-managed man. We lived together for a period of time, and I was able to observe how he always manages to optimize his tasks to the max, finding methods and techniques to do everything more efficiently and effectively. His time management is admirable, and he constantly enhances his knowledge through study techniques that he applies with great efficiency."

- Lina María Gomez,
Ex-Roommate and friend
